metadata.title: CVE-2020-15685 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
[Unknown description]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-15685` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

thunderbird - 1:78.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:78.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:78.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:78.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:78.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:78.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:78.7.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
